title: What Next for Crypto Bulls as ETH, XRP, SOL, ADA Drop 8–16% in a Week
contentSnippet: Technically, bitcoin’s break below the monthly mid-range at $100,266 cleared a key liquidity shelf, exposing a fast-track slide into thinner regions. Near-term support sits at $93,000 to $95,000.

title: Hong Kong launches tokenized deposit pilot with real-value transactions
contentSnippet: The HKMA has launched the pilot phase of Project Ensemble to test real-value transactions using tokenized deposits and digital assets.

title: Bitcoin Market Memory Shaken: BTC's Bounce Zone Broken In Strategy-Like Bear Move
contentSnippet: Bitcoin has fallen below a key support level, breaking a bullish pattern.

title: Bitcoin hits six-month low near $95,000; analysts optimistic for bullish turn
contentSnippet: Market experts forecasted a liquidity expansion as the US government resumes normal operations, which is expected to improve prices.

title: Arca CIO Jeff Dorman Rejects Claims Saylor’s Strategy (MSTR) Faces Forced Bitcoin-Sale Risk
contentSnippet: Dorman says fears that Strategy will be forced to sell bitcoin are misplaced, citing the firm’s balance sheet, governance and cash flow.

title: Ether Dips Below $3,100; Investment Manager Says Market Views ETH as 'More Risky' Than BTC
contentSnippet: Timothy Peterson says ether ETFs have lost about 7% of cost-basis capital over five weeks, versus 4% for bitcoin ETFs.

title: Bitfinex Bitcoin Hack Money Launderer Razzlekhan Set to Release New Music
contentSnippet: Heather "Razzlekhan" Morgan will release a new track featuring her in an Ottoman helmet rapping about baklava, as she nears the end of her jail sentence.

title: Judge Should Not Acquit Tornado Cash Dev Roman Storm, Prosecutors Argue
contentSnippet: The DOJ filed its own post-trial motion last week, pushing back against Storm's motion for acquittal.

title: Bitcoin Falls Below $94,000 for First Time Since May Amid 'Extreme Fear' Sentiment
contentSnippet: Analysts highlighted retail distress, rare social-dominance surges and warnings of a possible deeper pullback as several major tokens remained under pressure.

title: Bitcoin Approaches 'Death Cross' as Market Tests Major Historical Pattern
contentSnippet: Despite its bearish reputation, every death cross in the current cycle has marked a major local bottom.

title: Dead Internet Theory Gains Traction as AI Content Surges Online
contentSnippet: Experts warn that much of what is now online comes from machines pretending to be human. What does that mean for the future internet?

title: Tom Lee Says Ether Is Entering a Bitcoin-Like 'Supercycle'; Critics Push Back
contentSnippet: BitMine Immersion Technologies’ executive chairman says ETH is beginning a bitcoin-style run as he highlights past drawdowns and patience.

title: What Is Q-Day? The Quantum Threat to Bitcoin Explained
contentSnippet: Experts warn quantum computers could someday forge Bitcoin’s digital signatures, allowing unauthorized transactions.

title: Memecoin Majors Diverge as DOGE Reclaims Trendline, SHIB Tests Daily Downtrend Floor
contentSnippet: Dogecoin rebounding sharply from a heavy-volume flush while Shiba Inu broke key support before staging an aggressive intraday reversal.

title: XRP Falls 4.3% Even After XRPC ETF Launch on Bitcoin Weakness, Finds Buyers Near $2.22
contentSnippet: The market remains bearish with XRP struggling to break above the $2.23–$2.24 resistance zone.

title: DOJ says US citizens helped North Korean IT workers infiltrate 136 companies
contentSnippet: The DOJ seized $15 million in Tether in order to return the funds to their rightful owners as part of an ongoing campaign against North Korean hackers.

title: Prediction Markets Are Coming for Your Favorite Sport, Says NBA Star Tristan Thompson
contentSnippet: Prediction markets dominated politics last year, but now they’re making a notable splash in the big leagues, NBA star Tristan Thompson said.

title: Ethereum Holders Are More Willing Than Bitcoin Investors to Part With Coins: Glassnode
contentSnippet: Ethereum holders move and sell their coins far more than Bitcoin holders, according to a new report from Glassnode.

title: Harvard triples down on bitcoin bet with spot ETF buys from world’s largest academic endowment
contentSnippet: Emory University and an Abu Dhabi sovereign wealth fund also added to their spot bitcoin ETF holdings in the third quarter of 2025.

title: Running Your Own Local Open-Source AI Model Is Easy—Here's How
contentSnippet: Local AI models offer privacy and zero subscription costs, letting you run powerful models completely offline. Here's how to start.

title: Harvard Triples Its Bitcoin Position as Emory Expands BTC ETF Holdings
contentSnippet: Harvard University and Emory both increased their Bitcoin exposure in the third quarter via ETF holdings, new filings show.

title: Tether may lead $1.2 billion round in German Robotics startup: FT
contentSnippet: The stablecoin issuer generated profits of over $10 billion during the first three quarters of this year and is looking to diversify its portfolio.

title: Bitcoin Is Falling, But Don't Call It a Bear Market Yet: Analyst
contentSnippet: Bitcoin dropped below $95K amid panic selling and shifting Fed rate expectations, though it may be too soon to call it a bear market.

title: Mizuho bearish on Circle’s shares, sees stock falling to $70 amid earnings and competition risks
contentSnippet: Mizuho Securities maintained an “underperform” rating on Circle’s stock while lowering its share price target to $70.

title: Trump Bros' American Bitcoin Stock Rises After Q3 Revenue Spike
contentSnippet: The Trump family-backed American Bitcoin mining firm shared quarterly results on Friday, adding more volatility to its stock's performance.

title: The Daily: Spot bitcoin ETFs see second-largest outflows on record, Michael Saylor slams rumors Strategy sold BTC, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: 'Demonic': AI App That Lets Users 'Talk' to Dead Loved Ones Faces Backlash
contentSnippet: 2Wai’s new “HoloAvatar” tool turns minutes of footage into lifelike replicas of deceased loved ones, igniting ethical alarms over consent, privacy, and the commercialization of grief.

title: Leading Ethereum treasury firm BitMine appoints new CEO, expands board
contentSnippet: Leading Ethereum treasury firm BitMine (BMNR) has appointed a new chief executive and three independent directors.

title: ‘We are buying’: Michael Saylor says ‘no truth’ to rumor that Strategy sold 47,000 bitcoin
contentSnippet: Earlier Friday, Arkham data showed Saylor’s Strategy reduced its bitcoin holdings from 484,000 BTC to about 437,000 BTC.

title: Oklahoma man gets five years for leading $9.4 million crypto investment fraud scheme
contentSnippet: An Oklahoma man was sentenced to spend five years in prison for running a fraudulent $9.4 million crypto scheme.
